required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study to Evaluate the Differences in Pharmadynamics, Pharmacokinetics, and Safety Between Ciprofol and Propofol
clinical_study.official_title: A Single-center, Open-label, Randomized, Two-stage, Two-way Crossover Study to Evaluate the Differences in Pharmadynamics, Pharmacokinetics, and Safety Between Ciprofol and Propofol at Different Doses in Healthy Subjects

lead_sponsor.agency: Sichuan Haisco Pharmaceutical Group Co., Ltd.

clinical_study.source: Sichuan Haisco Pharmaceutical Group Co., Ltd.

brief_summary.textblock: This is a single-center, open-label, randomized, two-stage, two-way crossover Phase I study in healthy male subjects.The main objective is to evaluate the differences in pharmadynamics (PD), pharmacokinetics (PK), and safety between ciprofol injectable emulsion and propofol injectable emulsion at different doses in healthy subjects.

primary_outcome.time_frame: From first dose of study drug until fully alert on day 1
primary_outcome.description: Observe the change of modified observer's assessment of alert /sedation during the whole trial

primary_outcome.time_frame: From first dose of study drug until fully alert on day 1

primary_outcome.measure: Safety by measurement of Adverse Events
primary_outcome.time_frame: First dose of study drug on day 1

secondary_outcome.time_frame: First dose of study drug on day 1

secondary_outcome.measure: Area under the plasma concentration versus time curve (AUC)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: First dose of study drug on day 1
First dose of study drug on day 1
First dose of study drug on day 1
First dose of study drug on day 1
First dose of study drug on day 1
First dose of study drug on day 1

other_outcome.measure: Use of dynamometer to estimate Muscular strength of lower limbs
other_outcome.time_frame: From 30 minutes before administration to 1 hour after administration on day 1

other_outcome.measure: The differences between the Montreal Cognitive Assessment (MoCA) test score in Ciprofol group and in a control group of Propofol
other_outcome.time_frame: From the baseline period to 1 hour after administration on day 1
other_outcome.description: Total score of the MoCA,the higher scores mean a better outcome

arm_group.description: First-stage: 0.4mg/kg, 0.6 mg/kg, 0.8 mg/kg Second-stage: 0.4mg/kg, 0.6 mg/kg, 0.8 mg/kg
First-stage: 2.0mg/kg, 3.0 mg/kg, 4.0 mg/kg Second-stage: 2.0mg/kg, 3.0 mg/kg, 4.0 mg/kg

intervention.description: First-stage: 0.4mg/kg, 0.6 mg/kg, 0.8 mg/kg Second-stage: 0.4mg/kg, 0.6 mg/kg, 0.8 mg/kg
First-stage: 2.0mg/kg, 3.0 mg/kg, 4.0 mg/kg Second-stage: 2.0mg/kg, 3.0 mg/kg, 4.0 mg/kg
